key_risks: Heavy reliance on the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area
Significant exposure to government-related tenants and Amazon (HQ2)
Rising interest rates and inflationary pressures
controversies: Ongoing litigation related to rental price-fixing allegations
Multiple appeals regarding lease interpretations under the Contract Disputes Act
Customer complaints filed with the Better Business Bureau
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and achieving LEED certifications
social_issues: Customer complaints indicating potential issues with tenant relations or property management
governance_issues: Ethical concerns raised by rental price-fixing allegations
